DOC.detailed_description: Study Design This clinical trial Phase IV , randomize , single-blind , two arm : - MMR ( TV ) combine measles , mumps rubella vaccine produce Bio-Manguinhos , apply healthy child 12 23 month . Multidose presentation , one batch . - MMR ( GSK-TV ) , produce GlaxoSmithKline , age . Monodose presentation , one batch .
